title: if you had to complain about ONLY one champ, who would it be?

replies.body: {{champion:157}} always yasuo, wind wall invalidates most skills and champion auto attacks in the game and he has strong wave clear with minimal items for no cost, even akali uses energy while yasuo can face tank a minion wave and just lifesteal off of it faster than any champ in the game. not even singed tanks waves for free because at least he has to run a health pot to heal off the damage he takes.

I hate having an ezreal on my team, 9 times out of 10 they just deal very subpar damage while not feeding b/c of how safe he is, but if the game gets to 30 minutes all they have is crappy poke and they never follow up.

1 time out of 10 though you get that guy who only ever plays ezreal and is actually pretty good, but that doesn't make up for the 9 useless adcs.

hes not frustrating just abuse his 22 second cooldown on his w and when he ults and duskblades u jst get zhoynas u can stop it :D armor from it will protect u the whole game :D :D

i hate zed mains defending him..

Zhonyas barely stops shit now because he can kill you after you use it, not to mention since it was nerfed, he can ult more than a couple times in the timespan that the active is down (120 seconds). Armor does barely any protection especially once he gets lethality.

He's frustrating as shit.

lethality is good vs low target champs not good vs someone with lots of armor. 

and {{item:3157}} isnt mean to completely counter him. but it is meant to get you out of a jam/misplay. 
by getting {{item:2420}} early then going into {{item:3157}} should be enough to not die to him early from ult to keep him from snowballing. 

he is an assassin designed to kill squishy champs but he is a lot more vulnerable then he use to be 

also considering your faced vs zed mid who is ad , they have an adc who is usually ad and top/jng 1 of them is ad , it might be a good idea to consider ninja tabs over sorc shoes to have more survive-ability. 

so with base armor at lvl 6 for lux is 35 + {{item:3157}} {{item:3047}} is 65 armor for a total of 100 armor (just for example dont expect you to have boot tier 2 boots and full zhonyas unless you farmed really well ) so he has to have a lot of lethality to ignore that much armor. 

but even late game as lux you have base 1935 hp and 87 armor combined with above items is 152 armor. 

sometimes you can just build blindly full damage and not survive also maybe taking 2ndary tankier runes might help too.

Well yeah I know that. But even if you deny him snowball from you specifically, he can just go down bot and get a double kill on the stupid bot lane that doesn't listen to your pings and then snowballs from there (I speak from experience).

Also, rushing Zhonyas also makes you even more behind then he will because he will be able to rush his first damage item, but you are not and then it makes you harder to kill anybody.

I usually ban him so I don't have to play against him anymore, but in the rare case I do, I take defensive masteries, ninja tabis and Zhonyas second item if I don't have to rush it. 

Still, he melts through the armor anyway. 

He's a stupid champ that should have never been created.

{{champion:77}} Yeap. You see that right.

Now, he is by no means OP, yet, somehow, a good Udyr can be more annoying than Teemo. For some reason it feels he can stick to you no matter what you do. He can be extremely fast to the point he can, seemingly, pop out of nowhere when you chase an enemy, stun you and then just disappear.

And i repeat. He is not even remotely OP. I just find it extremely annoying having him on the opposite team.

Udyr is always OP if he gets level 2-3 kills and actually builds right. That's the kicker..... does he get those early game kills..... If he does..... he's the definition of a snowball. If he doesn't, he's dead weight.

Also depends if the opposing team has a lot of slows. Udyr gets stomped by slows. If not..... he can run the table.

In other words, I generally disagree with you. He is OP. It's the players who make Udyr look average.

{{champion:126}} personal hatred

Complain about how strong they always are?  Complain about how weak they always are?  Complain that the design is unhealthy?  (Those three are all kind of the same thing)

Complain that they're unfun to play against?  Definitely {{champion:7}} for me.  She just feels like she lacks counterplay, even though I know she scales relatively poorly.
Complain that they feel bad to play?  Dunno; other than champs who are getting reworked ({{champion:10}}), most of the types of champs I play (mages/enchanters) are very fun to me.  Apparently a lot of assassins/fighters have issues, but I don't play those!

{{champion:104}} currently gets WAY too much impact out of hitting an auto attack. It's not hard at all for Graves to hit 3 Pellets on one target, which pretty much 1 shot auto's many champions. He can miss his entire kit, but the auto attack will do over 1600 damage.
